title: The Home Depot Announces Second Quarter Fiscal 2023 Results; Reaffirms Fiscal 2023 Guidance; Announces $15 Billion Share Repurchase Authorization
text: ATLANTA , Aug. 15, 2023 /PRNewswire/ -- The Home Depot®, the world's largest home improvement retailer, today reported sales of $42.9 billion for the second quarter of fiscal 2023, a decrease of 2.0% from the second quarter of fiscal 2022. Comparable sales for the second quarter of fiscal 2023 decreased 2.0%, and comparable sales in the U.S. decreased 2.0%.

title: Home Depot tops Q2 estimates, backs guidance and unveils $15 billion share buyback program
text: Home Depot Inc.'s stock HD rose 0.9% in premarket trade Tuesday, after the home-improvement retailer beat estimates for its second-quarter earnings, back its guidance and announced a $15 billion share buyback program. The company posted net income of $4.659 billion, or $4.65 a share, for the quarter, down from $5.173 billion, or $5.05 a share, in the year-earlier period.
